#text=I often make several trips to the library so my library card is always left in my wallet and I never have to search for it .
#text=Today , I had to return a book but I also wanted to borrow a new one .
#text=I had recently finished an introductory book on learning a new language and wanted to replace it with something more enjoyable .
#text=It was only a few minutes away and I only had to cross a few streets .
#text=Walking past the small store , I found the reception desk where a librarian was waiting for me .
#text=I checked back in my book on a new language and checked the rest of the library .
#text=I scanned the aisles for the fiction and fantasy sections .
#text=Once found , I just picked some random books until I was able to choose one that seemed interesting enough to read .
#text=I took my book back to the reception desk and had it checked out with my library card .
